name: Bubble Boy
description:
Having spent your whole life in a bubble, it is time to escape your small world and see the much bigger world around you that you've only ever heard about.

Unfortunately, even with your bubble, your immune system is only so strong - and the world outside is full of threats.

Avoid the pollen, sneezes and bird droppings to clear each stage!

HOW TO PLAY

Bubble Boy supports both keyboards and gamepads. Press left and right to move, and "Fire" to jump.

Keyboard:

  • A/D - left/right
  • LCtrl - jump

Gamepad

  • Analog stick 1 / whatever it is on your gamepad - left /right
  • A / whatever it is on your gamepad - jump

These controls can be remapped in the launcher.
